definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Hammer and sickle symbols of the industrial worker and the peasant are used as the emblem of the ussr .
sentences.chinese: 代表產業工人和農民的錘子鐮刀圖案用作前蘇聯國徽。

sentences.english: Factory labor is cheap in China, where monthly wages average less than $300.
sentences.chinese: 產業工人在中國很便宜，每月少於三百美元。

sentences.english: But the Fed does not have a means to transform construction workers into manufacturing workers.
sentences.chinese: 但是央行怎麼樣也無法將建築工人轉變爲產業工人。

sentences.english: Workers in some industries have their hearing harmed by the noise of the machines.
sentences.chinese: 一些產業工人的聽力被機器的噪音損傷了。

sentences.english: More industrial workers joined the ranks of the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 更多的產業工人加入到失業大軍中。
